name: Happy Bubble: Shoot n Pop
description:
Happy Bubble is a brand new bubble shooter game for everyone!
Little girl, Emma's backyard is full of bubbles! Emma needs your help to blast all bubbles and finding her toys!
Join the colorful bubble adventure to play puzzles with endless fun!

FEATURES
• Aim, shoot and match 3 bubbles to pop them!
• Play tons of unique levels. Experience all the different challenges and puzzles!
• Enjoy soothing sounds and gorgeous visual effects.
• Creative special boosters to pass those tricky levels!
• Save the rubber duck family trapped in the bubble and spinner!
• Collect stars by completing levels to earn star box!
• Easy and fun to play but challenging to master!

NOTES
• Happy Bubble contains ads like banner, interstitial, video and house ads.
• Happy Bubble is free to play, but you can purchase In-app items like AD FREE and Coins.

E-MAIL
• help@bitmango.com

App Permissions

[Required Permissions]
- none

[Optional Permissions]
- Photo / Media / File: required storage access permission to save game data
